text: Ra jo timibata (dandako praptima) chito gariraheka chan rahatabhanda agavai nai, jaba ki uhambhanda agadi dherai siksaprada udaharana a'isakeko cha. Ra timro palanahara mukti dinevala cha, mancheharuko nacanhido aparadhama pani ra yo pani niscita kuro cha, ki timro palanakarta bhayankara danda dinevala cha
